author: Lance Ulanoff
description: Apple is upgrading its approach to parental controls across its ecosystem. We check out the best updates.
title: 4 surprising ways you can gain control of your kid's screen time on the iPhone and iPad

description: New Emdoor workstation brings Ryzen AI MAX power, soldered memory, a heavy build, and gaming-style features, leaving doubts about its real role and professional appeal.
title: They keep coming! One more workstation laptop has emerged with an AMD Ryzen AI MAX 395 CPU - and I can't wait to find out how much it costs

author: Dashiell Wood
description: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 got a new trailer at Gamescom Opening Night Live 2025, but I wasn't impressed.

description: Capcom just shared a brand new look at Resident Evil Requiem during the Gamescom Opening Night Live 2025 showcase, and yeah, it looks spooky!
title: New Resident Evil Requiem gameplay teaser solidifies it as my most anticipated game of 2026 so far

author: Demi Williams
description: Sucker Punch has announced that Ghost of Yōtei will receive a free Legends multiplayer mode in 2026.

description: Maxsun’s Arc Pro B60 Dual 48G Turbo combines two Intel GPUs with 48GB VRAM, targeting workstation users while raising concerns about power demands and practical adoption.
title: A dual Intel GPU graphics card with 48GB of VRAM has gone on sale for $1200 - now I wonder whether you could plug two of these into a workstation

description: Asus ExpertBook P3 arrives in 14-inch and 16-inch versions with Ryzen AI, five-year updates, a durable chassis, and balanced features tailored toward productivity.
title: Asus just released a flurry of new laptops which comes with a 5-year BIOS update warranty and 1-year McAfee+ premium subs

description: Fallout season 2 will premiere on Prime Video in mid-December – and its first trailer just teased the live-action show's take on a Deathclaw.
